result.eng: He raised his glass to drink to health.
result.ga: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ól
result.orig: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ól
result.html: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ólHe raised his glass to drink to health.
result.ponchtml: D'ardaiġ sé a ġloine ċun sláinte a ólHe raised his glass to drink to health.

result.eng: In case of emergency, break the glass.
result.ga: I gcás práinne bris an ghloine
result.orig: I gcás práinne bris an ghloine
result.html: I gcás práinne bris an ghloineIn case of emergency, break the glass.
result.ponchtml: I gcás práinne bris an ġloineIn case of emergency, break the glass.

result.eng: She grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.
result.ga: Rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín as
result.orig: Rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín as
result.html: Rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín asShe grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.
result.ponchtml: Rug sí ar an ġloine agus ḃain súimín asShe grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ga: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.orig: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.html: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ponchtml: Is cosúil go ḃfuil sé de ḃuaiḋ orṫu a ḃeiṫ tugṫa don ġloine mar ṁáistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
